spell.name: Summon Pixie
spell.description: Summon a cute flying Pixie to join you as a guest. Costs 15 MP per turn during the battle to keep her with you. Cast again to send her away. The Pixie has both a good Magic Light attack, and a pocket full of healing dust.

EFFECT.Notes: Summons the Pixie to be a guest, working alongside you and your pet. Casting to summon or remove still takes a turn.
